jurassic-park.title: Jurassic Park
jurassic-park.author: Michael Crichton
jurassic-park.synopsis: A thrilling story of genetic engineering gone wrong. Scientists bring dinosaurs back to life—but can they control them?

sherlock-holmes.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Thinking Engine
sherlock-holmes.author: James Lovegrove
sherlock-holmes.synopsis: A powerful new machine can solve crimes before they happen. Holmes suspects there's more to it than logic and gears...

harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone.author: J.K. Rowling
harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-stone.synopsis: The first book in the Harry Potter series introduces readers to Harry Potter, a young boy who discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday. He attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he makes friends, learns magic, and undiscover's secrets about his mysterious past and a dark wizard named Voldemort.

sherlock-holmes-and-the-zombie-problem.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Zombie Problem
sherlock-holmes-and-the-zombie-problem.author: Nick S.Thomas
sherlock-holmes-and-the-zombie-problem.synopsis: A 60,000-word pulp novel reimagining “The Final Problem” (1893) with Moriarty unleashing zombies across England. Holmes and Watson use martial arts, firearms, fencing—and their wits—on a bloody, globe‑trotting mission to save the world.

spook-country.title: Spook Country
spook-country.author: William Gibson
spook-country.synopsis: A thriller by William Gibson exploring surveillance, geopolitics, and virtual landscapes.

succubus-revealed.title: Succubus Revealed
succubus-revealed.author: Richelle Mead
succubus-revealed.synopsis: Georgina Kincaid has been a lot of things: a seductress, a demon, a lover, and a pawn of Hell. But now she faces her toughest challenge yet — love and freedom. In this final chapter of the series, Georgina must choose between eternal damnation or sacrificing everything for the man she loves. With alliances shifting and secrets exposed, her decision will reshape the supernatural world.

valley-of-death-zombie-trailer-park.title: Valley of Death: Zombie Trailer Park
valley-of-death-zombie-trailer-park.author: William R.Bebb
valley-of-death-zombie-trailer-park.synopsis: In a secluded valley near Albuquerque, a trailer park's residents—including illegal immigrants, war vets, meth cooks, and hermits—face a zombie outbreak following a deadly industrial accident. When Josey arrives, he discovers the undead horrors within the valley—and worse than rattlesnakes—is the living dead.

the-darwin-elevator.title: The Darwin Elevator
the-darwin-elevator.author: Jason M.Hough
the-darwin-elevator.synopsis: Set in the mid-23rd century, Earth has been devastated by an alien plague that turns most people into savage “subs.” The only safe zone is the area around a space elevator in Darwin, Australia, built by mysterious alien “Builders.” Immune scavenger Skyler Luiken leads missions beyond the elevator's protective aura to recover supplies—until the elevator begins to fail and deeper alien secrets are unearthed.

percy-jackson-and-the-olympians-the-ligh.title: Percy Jackson and the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
percy-jackson-and-the-olympians-the-ligh.author: Rick Riordan
percy-jackson-and-the-olympians-the-ligh.synopsis: Percy Jackson, a twelve-year-old demigod, is accused of stealing Zeus's master lightning bolt. He embarks on a ten-day quest across the U.S. with his friends Annabeth and Grover to retrieve it and prevent a war among the gods.

it.title: IT
it.author: Stephen King
it.synopsis: Set in the fictional town of Derry, Maine, seven children—and later adults—face a malevolent, shape-shifting entity known as It which often appears as Pennywise the clown. The story alternates between their youth and their return 27 years later to confront their fears once more.
